alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 22 at 10:59PM MDT until April 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Chaffee County below 9000 feet and the Wet and Sangre De Cristo mountains. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may reduce visibility at times to less than 2 miles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft
